properties.name: transactiontypes
properties.description: WPF transaction types (csv for multiple types) https://emerchantpay.github.io/gateway-api-docs/#wpf-transaction-types

properties.name: token
properties.description: Terminal token and login credentials can be found in your admin panel.

properties.name: callbackUrl
properties.description: This is the url that should be called from the processor side. The hash is the processor service name sha1.

properties.name: iframelocation
properties.description: The cashier html document element name where the iframe should open. (_blank or cashier_iframe_content usually)
